tool_description: The Pulffy Cloudflare Bypass API is designed for ethical web scraping, allowing users to bypass Cloudflare protection and other bot detection mechanisms, enabling secure retrieval of web content. This comprehensive API provides endpoints for both GET and POST requests, supporting various use cases.
name: pulffy cloudflare bypass
title: pulffy cloudflare bypass

api_list.name: GET request
api_list.description: Retrieve web content securely, bypassing Cloudflare and other bot protections. Supports JSON and HTML responses. Include is_json to specify response format.

optional_parameters.name: is_json
optional_parameters.description:
Indicates whether the response content should be treated as JSON.
default : false
